name: Zendesk ack-back
description: Update Zendesk tickets to reflect when a PagerDuty incident has been acknowledged

ZENDESK_USERNAME.description: The username of the Zendesk user that will update the Zendesk ticket.

ZENDESK_PASSWORD.description: The password for the Zendesk user.

PAGERDUTY_SUBDOMAIN.description: The name of your PagerDuty subdomain, as it appears in the URL.
